text: Le Hom is a commune. It is found in the region Normandy in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Thury-Harcourt (the seat), Caumont-sur-Orne, Curcy-sur-Orne, Hamars and Saint-Martin-de-Sallen.Arrêté préfectoral 22 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Calvados
title: Le Hom
